original_text: When Jesus returned to the other side of the lake, the crowd was very happy to see him. They were all waiting for him to come back.
korean_text: 예수께서 돌아오시매 무리가 환영하니 이는 다 기다렸음이러라

sentences.original_text: When Jesus returned to the other side of the lake
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님이 호수의 다른 편으로 돌아오셨을 때

sentences.original_text: the crowd was very happy to see him
They were all waiting for him to come back
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모두 그분이 돌아오시기를 기다리고 있었습니다
